SEARCH
程序包 com.hsmkmathlib.integral.utils

接口 IntegralBase

所有已知实现类:
Simpson, Trapezoid
public interface IntegralBase
This interface provides the base class for the Integral interface. It contains methods for checking if a range is valid and for calculating the step size for a given range.
作者:
hatsusakuramiku

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    static final double
    EPS
    The default error tolerance for the integral methods.
    static final double
    PI
    The value of pi.

  • 字段详细资料

    • EPS

      static final double EPS
      The default error tolerance for the integral methods.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • PI

      static final double PI
      The value of pi.
      另请参阅:

  • 方法详细资料

    • checkRange

      default boolean checkRange(double leftEndpoint, double rightEndpoint)
      Checks if the range is valid. The range is valid if the left endpoint is less than the right endpoint.
      参数:
      leftEndpoint - The left endpoint of the range.
      rightEndpoint - The right endpoint of the range.
      返回:
      true If the range is valid, false otherwise.

    • getStep

      default double getStep(double leftEndpoint, double rightEndpoint, int littleRangeNumber)
      Calculates the step size for a given range.
      参数:
      leftEndpoint - The left endpoint of the range.
      rightEndpoint - The right endpoint of the range.
      littleRangeNumber - The number of little ranges.
      返回:
      The step size.

    • integral

      <T extends Function<Double, Double>> double integral(T func, double leftEndpoint, double rightEndpoint, double eps)
      Approximates the definite integral of a single-variable function over a specified interval using an adaptive integration method.
      参数:
      func - The function to integrate, represented as a Function<Double, Double>.
      leftEndpoint - The left endpoint of the integration interval.
      rightEndpoint - The right endpoint of the integration interval.
      eps - The desired error tolerance for the integration.
      返回:
      The approximate value of the definite integral.
      抛出:
      NullPointerException - If the function is null.
      ArithmeticException - If an arithmetic error occurs during integration.

    • integral

      default <T extends Function<Double, Double>> double integral(T func, double leftEndpoint, double rightEndpoint)
      Approximates the definite integral of a single-variable function over a specified interval using an adaptive integration method.
      参数:
      func - The function to integrate, represented as a Function<Double, Double>.
      leftEndpoint - The left endpoint of the integration interval.
      rightEndpoint - The right endpoint of the integration interval.
      返回:
      The approximate value of the definite integral.
      抛出:
      NullPointerException - If the function is null.
      ArithmeticException - If an arithmetic error occurs during integration.

    • integralFixedStep

      <T extends Function<Double, Double>> double integralFixedStep(T func, double leftEndpoint, double rightEndpoint, double step)
      Approximates the definite integral of a single-variable function over a specified interval using the trapezoidal rule with a fixed step size.
      参数:
      func - The function to integrate, represented as a Function<Double, Double>.
      leftEndpoint - The left endpoint of the integration interval.
      rightEndpoint - The right endpoint of the integration interval.
      step - The step size to use for the trapezoidal rule.
      返回:
      The approximate value of the definite integral.
      抛出:
      NullPointerException - If the function is null.
      ArithmeticException - If an arithmetic error occurs during integration.

    • integralFixedStep

      <T extends Function<Double, Double>> double integralFixedStep(T func, double leftEndpoint, double rightEndpoint, int littleRangeNumber)
      Approximates the definite integral of a single-variable function over a specified interval using the trapezoidal rule with a fixed step size.
      参数:
      func - The function to integrate, represented as a Function<Double, Double>.
      leftEndpoint - The left endpoint of the integration interval.
      rightEndpoint - The right endpoint of the integration interval.
      littleRangeNumber - The number of little ranges.
      返回:
      The approximate value of the definite integral.
      抛出:
      NullPointerException - If the function is null.
      ArithmeticException - If an arithmetic error occurs during integration.
